alert.note: Alert for Coastal Ocean; Ocean; Southeastern Burlington (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 12:42AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Ocean and southeastern Burlington Counties through 145 AM EDT... At 1242 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Point Pleasant Beach to near Shamong to Tuckerton. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Toms River, Barnegat, Beachwood, Shamong, Tuckerton, Seaside Heights, Surf City, Mantoloking, Atsion, Dover Beaches North, Holiday City South, Warren Grove, Chatsworth, Dover Beaches South, Wharton State Forest, Holiday City-Berkeley, Bamber Lake, Brookville, Bass River State Forest and Old Halfway. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 54 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
